title: INTERNSHIP
body1: Technical-PM Intern at Meta on the Facebook Marketplace Team.
body2: 1 of 10 Product interns; owning growth experiments and contributing to the long-term vision of Marketplace

title: STARTUP
body1: Co-founder of CaseCom, the world’s first platform for hosting case competitions.
body2: Recruited a team of 8 and worked with clients across Canada, including Shopify!

title: INTERNSHIP

body2: Launched a new GitHub integration and developer tooling to millions of merchants globally.

title: LEADERSHIP
body1: Co-chair of Hack Western, one of Canada’s largest annual student-run hackathons.
body2: Spent 3 years scaling the event to 800+ students across the world - previously led product and design for the event.

title: INTERNSHIP

body2: Helping to migrate over 50,000 employees over to new infrastructure and automated systems.

title: INTERNSHIP
